name: Sol (wesleystander)
description:
This was a collaborated project with 2 of my classmates where we made a 2D platformer that I initially invisioned as a parkour game but became a story and art driven adventure platformer. Set in post-dystopic Johannesburg after the city collapsed into the mines underneath it and brought pavement to a new floating utopia to cover the mess from the negligence before. You as a J-4 unit become sentient and venture into the depths to uncover the truth, but sometimes the truth isn't worth it...

Made by

myself(programming, integration and animation), Jacques Fourie (story and level design),  Stephnie van niekerk (art and player animation).
